attributes.action: Vaccinate as a routine all UK DAIRY herds against F&M
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, as a dairy farmer, want to vaccinate, under DEFRA supervision and at my expense, my pedigree dairy cattle against F & M disease.I undertake to sign a legally binding declaration that I will not allow any of my fallen or worked out stock to enter the food chain under any circumstances. I wish to preserve 100 years of work with a simple injection and stop this senseless slaughter.We already legally vaccinate for three other diseases in dairy cattle why not a fourth ?
